channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6580, MT6735, MT6737, MT6739, MT6750S, MT6753, MT6755S, MT6757, MT6757C, MT6757CD, MT6757CH, MT6763, MT6771, MT8163, MT8167, MT8167S, MT8173, MT8183, MT8321, MT8362A, MT8385, MT8518, MT8532, MT8765, MT8788
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6580, MT6735, MT6737, MT6739, MT6750S, MT6753, MT6755S, MT6757, MT6757C, MT6757CD, MT6757CH, MT6763, MT6771, MT8163, MT8167, MT8167S, MT8173, MT8183, MT8321, MT8362A, MT8385, MT8518, MT8532, MT8765, MT8788

item.description: In BT firmware, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06784478; Issue ID: ALPS06784478.
